column4: I am having problems with my bluetooth mouse. I am able to pair it properly to my laptop, and it works for that session, but as soon as I reboot the computer or turn off the mouse and turn it back on, the computer will not reconnect to the mouse. The mouse is still on the bluetooth-applet list, so it's not that the computer forgot about the mouse, it just will not connect and I have to repair it every time I want to use the mouse. Does
anyone have an idea as to what it could be?
there is a small button at the back of the mouse called connect, try it after turning it off
thanks for the hint, but that only puts the mouse in pairing mode, will not connect it to the computer.
